tetris

Class MusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tetris.MusicPlayer

  • public class MusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    The MusicPlayer is used to play MP3 and WAV music files in the tetris game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Eric Smyth

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MusicPlayer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void change(int the_change)
      The changed method stops the current song and adds the passed value to the index.
      boolean hasList()
      Used to verify if the player has a playlist loaded.
      boolean isStarted()
      Used to check if a song is started.
      void newList(java.io.File[] the_files)
      The newList method creates a new playlist using the passed array of files.
      void pause()
      Pauses or unpauses the current song as applicable.
      void play()
      Restarts a paused song.
      void stopPlay()
      Stops the current song if applicable.

        public MusicPlayer()

    • Method Detail

      • newList

        public void newList(java.io.File[] the_files)
        The newList method creates a new playlist using the passed array of files.
        Parameters:
        the_files - The array of files to add to the playlist.

      • change

        public void change(int the_change)
        The changed method stops the current song and adds the passed value to the index. The file at the new index is then played
        Parameters:
        the_change - The change to the index

      • hasList

        public boolean hasList()
        Used to verify if the player has a playlist loaded.
        Returns:
        true if the player has a playlist.

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()
        Used to check if a song is started.
        Returns:
        true if there is a song playing.

      • stopPlay

        public void stopPlay()
        Stops the current song if applicable.

      • play

        public void play()
        Restarts a paused song.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses or unpauses the current song as applicable.
